editor.label: Continuous Integration - ClearCase
editor.description: A schedule that is enabled for ElectricSentry continuous integration with ClearCase.

formElement.label: View:
formElement.documentation: The name of a ClearCase dynamic view, used to query and label elements within a ClearCase VOB. (Required)

formElement.label: Path:
formElement.documentation: The name of a path within the specified ClearCase view, used to access and label elements within a ClearCase VOB. (Required)

formElement.label: Branch:
formElement.documentation: The name of a branch within the specified ClearCase path. (Required)

formElement.label: Quiet time minutes:
formElement.documentation: The number of minutes of no check-in activity required before launching the procedure.

formElement.label: Enabled for ElectricSentry:
formElement.documentation: Enable for continuous integration monitoring by ElectricSentry.
